Here's the story!!

For years, Kerbin has been a planet which most important endeavor was walking down the street. However, that changed a few years ago. The War of the World shook the planet apart. It used to be just a single government, with everyone just happy and living. However, there was a buildup of weapons in Korupe, specifically Kermany. One of the greatest weapons of this time was the K-2, or Kerbal 2. The K-1 was just a bomb with wings and an SRB. The designer of this weapon, Wherner von Kerman, decided that the weapon was too powerful for a nation to use against another. So he fled to the United Kerbal Union or UKU. The Koviet Union, or KU, was hot on their trails by this time. The Koviets picked up a few engineers and then left. The Koviets gave the Kerbnese a few engineers. The Kanadian's looked like they wanted to go into space. It look like a world space race was about to start. Every country built rockets and probes to explore space. The main thread was closed by the moderators
I know, I asked if I could reboot it and they said no way, no roleplay
Ok, Zoo has mentioned that, if you guys wish to continue this, that he has a forum where we can do so.

Note this- the forum is going to require all previous stories sadly dropped. You can have a story, but real world-alike nations (such as Kermica, Kanda, Kapan, etc) are not in it, but there is still freedom in your choice of direction. This is for mechanic and story based purposes.

This sounds harsh, but once you get used to the mechanics (which are mostly career mode driven), it's not big deal. As to the stories, once you perform a few missions you'll have it back in no time.
